changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table file_meta ( id varchar(32) primary key, actual boolean, file_name varchar(300), mime_type varchar(100) not null, file_size bigint, portion_size int not null )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql:
create table file_portion ( id varchar(32) references file_meta, portion_index bigint,
content byteA not null,
primary key(id, portion_index) )
